price: Дан у коме ће журно, као да идолима хрле, из гробова да изађу,
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi sirāʿan ka-annahum ilā nuṣubin yūfiḍūna
